Container.Name: Redis
Container.Overview:
Redis is an open source (BSD licensed), in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker. Based on official Redis Docker image.
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@xiaoditx Templates: https://github.com/xushier/Unraid-Docker-Templates Icons: https://github.com/xushier/HD-Icons BiliBili: https://space.bilibili.com/32313260 Blog: https://www.xdtx.cc QQ Group: 647605169 WeChat: 小迪同学

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: This is Redis default connection port.
